languages.text: "Мы фиксируем паритет сил и использование обеими сторонами консервативных стратегий ведения боя, направленных на медленное достижение позиционного превосходства. Тактический прогноз гласит, что подобное положение сохранится еще какое-то время".

traits.locale_text: "На данный момент сложно определить победителя — силы сторон примерно равны. По нашим прогнозам, данный паритет будет сохраняться еще какое-то время".

languages.text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."
languages.original_text: "Мы фиксируем паритет сил и использование обеими сторонами консервативных стратегий ведения боя, направленных на медленное достижение позиционного превосходства. Тактический прогноз гласит, что подобное положение сохранится еще какое-то время".

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult to determine the winner at this time, the forces are roughly equal. We predict that parity will persist for a while longer."
"It is difficult to determine the winner at this time, the forces are roughly equal. We predict that parity will persist for a while longer."

"We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

"We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

"We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

languages.text: “双方势均力敌，都采取了保守战略，打算逐步取得阵地优势。战术预测表明，这样的僵局会继续持续一段时间。”
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: “双方势均力敌，都采取了保守战略，打算逐步取得阵地优势。战术预测表明，这样的僵局会继续持续一段时间。”

languages.text: « Nous observons une certaine parité entre les forces en présence, les deux parties employant des stratégies conservatrices dans le but d'atteindre progressivement la supériorité territoriale. Le pronostic tactique indique que la situation va encore durer un certain temps. »
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: « Nous observons une certaine parité entre les forces en présence, les deux parties employant des stratégies conservatrices dans le but d'atteindre progressivement la supériorité territoriale. Le pronostic tactique indique que la situation va encore durer un certain temps. »

languages.text: "Wir erkennen eine Ausgeglichenheit zwischen den Streitkräften, da beide Parteien konservativ vorgehen, um mit der Zeit eine überlegene Position zu erreichen. Aus taktischer Sicht deutet viel daraufhin, dass die derzeitige Pattsituation noch eine Weile anhalten wird."
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: "Wir erkennen eine Ausgeglichenheit zwischen den Streitkräften, da beide Parteien konservativ vorgehen, um mit der Zeit eine überlegene Position zu erreichen. Aus taktischer Sicht deutet viel daraufhin, dass die derzeitige Pattsituation noch eine Weile anhalten wird."

languages.text: «Hemos detectado que ambas fuerzas están igualadas, pues actúan con prudencia para conseguir poco a poco la superioridad posicional. Según el pronóstico táctico, permanecerán un rato más en este punto muerto».
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos detectado que ambas fuerzas están igualadas, pues actúan con prudencia para conseguir poco a poco la superioridad posicional. Según el pronóstico táctico, permanecerán un rato más en este punto muerto».

languages.text: 「両陣営が徐々に優位に立つことを目指し、保守的な戦略をとっているため、両軍の均衡が保たれている。戦術的な予測では、この行き詰まりはもうしばらく続くだろう」
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: 「両陣営が徐々に優位に立つことを目指し、保守的な戦略をとっているため、両軍の均衡が保たれている。戦術的な予測では、この行き詰まりはもうしばらく続くだろう」

languages.text: "İki taraf da peyderpey daha iyi mevzilere yerleşmek için muhafazakâr stratejiler uygulamakta. Bu da harbin denklik içinde yürümesine sebep oluyor. Taktiksel tespitlerimize göre bu yenişememe vaziyeti, bir müddet daha sürecek."
languages.original_text: "We are detecting parity between the forces as both parties employ conservative strategies with the aim of gradually achieving positional superiority. Tactical prognosis suggests that this impasse will persist for a while longer."
